txt.en: The default access to your crafting panel is by striking T on your keyboard. You can also access the craft panel by clicking on the button in your UI that has the appearance of a hammer striking an anvil, or by double-clicking on a craft facility that you can use.\n\nOnce you open the panel you will need to navigate to the correct profession tab in the upper left section of your craft panel UI.
How do I open my crafting panel?
